material: cast iron with neoprene or vinyl-style coating
usage: Light strength training and toning exercises for arms, shoulders and back at home or in the gym.
key_features: Pink cast iron dumbbells coated with neoprene for durability
Coating helps protect floors and other fitness equipment
Helps tone and sculpt arms, shoulders and back
Hexagonal shape for easy stacking and roll-free use
Pair weight totals 4 kg (2 kg + 2 kg)
Thick coating for comfortable, non-slip feel
Hexagon-shaped edges for easy storage and to prevent rolling
ai_description: A pair of compact pink hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth, matte coated finish. Each end clearly shows the KAKSS logo and “2 KG” in white. The hex-shaped heads prevent rolling, and the uniform pink coating covers the cast-iron core for a clean, modern look.
target_audience: Home and gym users seeking light to moderate hand weights, including beginners and fitness enthusiasts who prefer compact, coated dumbbells.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells sets for Gym Exercise (2KG Pink Pair)
